metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl                                            
          Ingredients:                                                              
                                                                                    
            •  1 cup cottage cheese                                                 
            •  1/4 cup diced cucumber                                               
            •  1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved                                      
            •  1/4 cup diced bell pepper                                            
            •  Salt and pepper to taste                                             
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. •  Serve immediately. •  Serve immediately.
•  Serve with salsa. •  Serve with salsa. •  Add cheese, sausage or bacon, onions and bell pepper to the eggs.

•  Add sausage or bacon and bell pepper. Breakfast Casserole                                                       
                                                                                    
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  6 large eggs                                                         
            •  1 cup milk                                                           
            •  1 cup shredded cheese                                                
            •  1/2 cup cooked sausage or bacon                                      
            •  1/2 cup diced bell pepper                                            
                                                                                    
            •  1/2 cup diced onion •  Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.

Veggie Wrap                                                               
          Ingredients:                                                              
                                                                                    
            •  1 large whole wheat tortilla                                         
            •  1/4 cup hummus                                                       
            •  1/4 cup shredded carrots                                             
            •  1/4 cup sliced cucumber                                              
            •  1/4 cup baby spinach                                                 
            •  1/4 cup sliced bell pepper                                           
          Instructions:                                                             
                                                                                    
            •  Spread hummus on the tortilla. •  Layer with shredded carrots, cucumber, spinach, and bell pepper. •  Slice in half and serve.
•  Add optional toppings if desired. •  Add potatoes, bell pepper, and onion, and cook until tender. •  Stir in cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion.

•  Serve chicken over cooked rice, garnished with sliced green onions. •  Sliced green onions for garnish                                      
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, sake, grated ginger, and minced garlic. •  Serve over cooked pasta.

•  Garnish with lemon wedges and serve. Pork Chops with Apples                                                    
                                                                                    
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  4 pork chops                                                         
            •  2 apples, sliced                                                     
            •  1 small onion, sliced                                                
            •  1/4 cup apple cider                                                  
            •  1/4 cup chicken broth                                                
            •  2 tablespoons butter                                                 
                                                                                    
            •  1 tablespoon olive oil                                               
            •  1 teaspoon thyme                                                     
            •  Salt and pepper to taste                                             
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  Season pork chops with salt and pepper. •  Serve warm.

•  Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. •  In a skillet, cook ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned. Lasagna                                                                   
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  1 pound ground beef                                                  
            •  1 small onion, diced                                                 
            •  2 cloves garlic, minced                                              
                                                                                    
            •  1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce                                     
            •  1 can (15 ounces) ricotta cheese                                     
            •  1 egg                                                                
            •  1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese                                       
            •  1 teaspoon dried basil                                               
            •  1 teaspoon dried oregano                                             
            •  9 lasagna noodles, cooked                                            
            •  2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese                                    
                                                                                    
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).

•  Garnish with chopped peanuts and serve. •  Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp or chicken, and chopped green onions. Beef Bourguignon                                                          
                                                                                    
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  2 pounds beef chuck, cut into cubes                                  
            •  1 small onion, diced                                                 
            •  2 cloves garlic, minced                                              
            •  1 cup red wine                                                       
            •  2 cups beef broth                                                    
            •  1 cup mushrooms, sliced                                              
            •  1 cup carrots, sliced                                                
                                                                                    
            •  1 cup pearl onions

            •  2 tablespoons flour                                                  
            •  2 tablespoons butter                                                 
            •  1 teaspoon thyme                                                     
            •  1 bay leaf

          Instructions:                                                             
                                                                                    
            •  Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).

•  Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve. •  Serve warm. Meatloaf                                                                  
          Ingredients:

Beef and Broccoli                                                         
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced                                  
            •  2 cups broccoli florets                                              
            •  1 small onion, diced                                                 
            •  2 cloves garlic, minced                                              
            •  1/4 cup soy sauce                                                    
            •  1/4 cup beef broth                                                   
                                                                                    
            •  2 tablespoons oyster sauce                                           
            •  1 tablespoon cornstarch                                              
            •  2 tablespoons vegetable oil                                          
            •  Cooked rice for serving                                              
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, beef broth, oyster sauce, and cornstarch. •  Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and serve. •  Serve over cooked rice.

            •  1 pound ground turkey

•  Cook sandwiches in the skillet until golden brown and cheese is melted. •  Serve warm. •  Serve warm.

            •  In a bowl, toss pork cubes with cornstarch. •  Serve over cooked rice. •  Return pork to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce.
•  Mix barbecue sauce, chicken broth, and brown sugar, and pour over pork. •  Place onion and garlic in a slow cooker, then add pork. •  Shred pork with forks and mix with sauce.

Pulled Pork Sandwiches                                                    
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  2 pounds pork shoulder

•  Garnish with green onions and serve. Honey Garlic Pork Ribs                                                    
          Ingredients:                                                              
            •  2 pounds pork ribs

            •  Sliced green onions for garnish                                      
          Instructions:                                                             
            •  Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C). •  Season ribs with salt, pepper, and paprika, then place in a baking dish.
•  Serve with lemon slices. •  Serve warm. •  Serve duck with sliced green onions and mandarin pancakes.

•  Serve hot, garnished with shredded cheese and sour cream. •  Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan. Gnocchi with Sage Butter

o  Mix cod with mashed potatoes, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and
                    beaten eggs. Bouillabaisse

o  Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes. o  Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese. Green Bean Casserole

            •  1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved Shrimp and Avocado Salad

            •  In a bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry

            •  1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced
